column4: Question: is there any pre-installed font on Ubunutu that resembles Verdana font?
i do not believe so, but verdana can be installed via the msttcorefonts package - to install type "sudo apt-get install msttcorefonts" without the quotes into a terminal
anyone know of a nautilus theming guide? i need to fix an old theme...
Thanks for your question. Unfortunately I can't tell every client to install it. I've to put Tahoma-equivalent font in Ubuntu in CSS.
